Frequently Asked Questions

1. Is The 6Valley Demo Free?

Yes, you can always test the 6Valley demo for FREE. 

2. How to Change The 6Valley Theme from Admin Panel and Explore Demo?

The theme-changing feature is disabled in the demo as thousands of users worldwide test our demo server at a time. To avoid conflict and give every user a smooth testing experience, please visit the latest demo section and explore the theme-wise demo. 

3. Why Does The Demo System Reset Itself?

All our demo system automatically resets in every 1-hour interval for your own data security. So, the following user won’t see the data you’ve used while testing our demo and gets a fresh demo server for testing. 

4. Where Can I Find Demo User Credentials for 6Valley?

The Admin and Seller panel demo credentials are already integrated into the demo login interface. You can also use the seller panel credentials to explore the 6Valley Seller app. 

To experience the customer and deliveryman app, you have to create demo credentials yourself.

Build Your eCommerce Business with 6Valley!

Get Started
